original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2321)@ 在武將四周，召喚12隻<color=#4cc769>魍魎石鬼</color>協助作戰。 <color=#4cc769>魍魎石鬼</color>屬性： <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1291)@ 武力值：$Soldier_Str(1291)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2321)@ Around the generals, summon 12 <color=#4cc769> sprites and stone ghosts</color> to assist in the battle. Attribute:  <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color>$Soldier_HP(1291)@ Force Value:  $Soldier_Str(1291)@
